articles.title: Former commercial building in Pittsfield is now a $325K industrial-style home for someone to ‘love’
articles.description:
The “Love” mural has become a bit of a landmark, and is included on a walking tour of the downtown area.

The post Former commercial building in Pittsfield is now a $325K industrial-style home for someone to ‘love’ appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Pittsfield transforms a former commercial building into a $325K industrial-style home.
The 'Love' mural, a local landmark, is featured on downtown walking tours.
This renovation contributes to the revitalization of Pittsfield's downtown area.
